channel.title: Logo Request
channel.description:
Hey there everyone. I bought my brother a Paintballing site, and now I want to get him a logo... not a banner, a logo.
I need two different sizes... one must be about 60px by 60x, and the other must be about 150px by 150px.
It needs to be simple, but still reflect something about the website.
The website is called Paintball Nirvana. It has both a website and forums that are used each day by paintballers all over the world.
The colors need to be something that will look good with the site, but still stand out enough so that even with a quick glance, someone will see it. The site is based around the color, e8dbb2.
Thanks to anyone that attempts to make this for me. I wish that I could offer some sort of reward, but I can't.
-Alexia
